newsitem.title: UK: UK gilts seen scoring fractional gains with Bunds.
newsitem.headline: UK gilts seen scoring fractional gains with Bunds.

text.p: 0638 GMT - UK gilt futures are expected to open fractionally higher as nerves settle after Thursday's UK rate rise and as the market eyes tentative gains from Bunds. No UK data due but market may get some direction from U.S. PPI data for June due at 1230 GMT.
